forgotpassword.title: Forgot your Password?
forgotpassword.description1: We have sent a password reset link to
forgotpassword.description2: Please click this link to reset your password. If you don't see this email, please check your junk mail folder or please retry with a different email address.
forgotpassword.description3: Enter your registered email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

error: Sorry, something has gone wrong, please try again.
